## Economist by :mortar_board: and data scientist by :heart: 

:::{#hero-heading}
Hi there, I'm Christoph Scheuch!

As a graduate financial economist, I have acquired an extensive **hypothesis–driven** research and **problem–solving** expertise in **data wrangling**, **statistical analysis**, and **model development**.

As a data scienctist, I have experience in developing **business intelligence tools**, prototyping **data-driven products**, and designing **data architectures**.

As a product manager, I have experience in all areas of software development, including **project management**, **agile methods**, and **design thinking**.
:::

## Experience

I'm the Head of AI at the social trading platform **[wikifolio.com](https://www.wikifolio.com?utm_source=christophscheuch.github.io)** and co-creator and maintainer of the **[Tidy Finance](https://www.tidy-finance.org?utm_source=christophscheuch.github.io)** project.

I write about tidy data science with R, Python and Julia on my blog **[Tidy Intelligence](https://blog.tidy-intelligence.com/?utm_source=christophscheuch.github.io)**.

I occasionally design shirts and mugs that you can find under the **[Tidy Swag](https://www.etsy.com/shop/tidyswag/?etsrc=sdt&utm_source=christophscheuch.github.io)** brand.

I'm also co-organizing events of the **[Berlin R Users Group](https://www.meetup.com/de-DE/berlin-r-users-group/)**.
